This bug has been in Firefox for many versions now - if I write serbian (latin or cyrillic), after some time - I don't know what happens - but it starts doubling my diacritics (and the cyrillic counterparts). That means, if I type "š", I get "šš" (cyrillic: "ш", "шш"), or "đ" - "đđ" and so on and so on, for all the diacritics: š, č, ž, đ, ć (ш, ч, ж, ђ, ћ). I have to restart firefox for it to go back to normal.

Reproducible: Didn't try




It happens on all the computers and notebooks I use, and they all have different systems (XP or 7).
